main.name: Gurmanpreet Kaur Grewal
main.description: I have a diverse set of skills ranging from HTML5 to CSS3, javascript, C#, .Net, Android development with java, PHP. I'm enthusiastic about my work.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Gurman! a web developer with one year experience in JavaScript (ES6), ReactJS (advanced JavaScript library), HTML5, CSS3. Lately, I have been working on web applications using MERN Stack | ReactJS | JavaScript | NodeJS | MongoDB and developed an urge to thrive in MERN Stack development and pave my way towards the same. Also, I have experience of 3 years as an Assistant Professor teaching object-oriented programming C++ | Data Structure | Operating System. Self-motivated and possess good communication skills.

project_Work.project1: - E-Commerce website named Drapsio in MERN Stack and REST APIs used for CRUD operations.
project_Work.project2: - ReactFlix (Netflix clone) using React, TMDB APIs and deployed on Firebase
project_Work.project3: - Recipe App designed in React and REST API to fetch and display data
project_Work.project4: - Bakery website named Baking Bella using MEAN stack and REST APIs used for CRUD operations.
project_Work.project5: - E-Commerce website named Geekillus using woo-commerce in WordPress.
project_Work.project6: - Bakery Android Application using Java language and Firebase.
project_Work.project7: - Designed Mockup for Furniture website named JK Furniture using Adobe Photoshop2020.

education.degree: PG Certification, Web Design and Development
